about_the_game:
Tactical Turn-Based Combat

Control up to 5 characters and master the battlefield through strategic positioning and zone of control (ZOC) to outmaneuver your foes. Spend action points (AP) wisely to perform powerful set-ups, strike multiple enemies, or bolster your defenses as the situation demands.

Skill Transformation System

Unleash the true potential of your skills by harnessing elemental energy on the battlefield, transforming them into even more powerful abilities temporarily during that battle.

Character Customization

Collect genes from defeated enemies to gain their passive skills, which you can use to customize your character's build. Enhance your character's skills through the runestone system, giving them additional effects to match your strategy.

Explore the Abyss

Uncover the mystery of the Abyss through story battles and strengthen your characters by fighting through randomly generated stages.


A young boy named Solomon falls into a deep hole called the "Abyss" and loses his life. Meanwhile, Rubynus, a mysterious human with a dragon arm, and his partner Esmeralda discover Solomon's lifeless body. Using runestone technology from their homeland, Arcadia, they revive Solomon in hopes of learning more about the Abyss.

Realizing they both lack the knowledge of the place they are in, they venture further into an unfamiliar territory filled with dangerous creatures and giant predators. Together, they must fight for their lives in this treacherous environment and find a way back to the surface.


  • Mouse and keyboard support
  • Controller support
  • Key bindings
  • Optimized for Steam Deck

name: Rebirth of Arcadia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 720 or above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU @ 3.20GHz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or above
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Rebirth of Arcadia is a story-rich turn-based tactics JRPG. Experience the journey of two groups of people working together to escape from the Abyss. Explore, defeat monsters, and harness the power of runestones to uncover the secrets of the Abyss.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
